title: Print, "Versailles, Gardens, The Pleasures of the Enchanted Isle", 1664
medium: Engraving and etching, black ink on rolled paper
inscribed:
Engraved on the plate at lower left of banner, at bottom:  "Israel Silvestre del, et Sculps"
Center of banner:  "Troisieme Journee"
Flanked by, on the left:  "Rupture du Palais et des enchantemens de l'Isle"
On the right:  "d'Alcine representee par un feu  d'Artiface"
Numbered at lower right:  "9"
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Horizontal rectangle:  In the foreground, a banner and above a frieze of the back of an audience.  In the center the Palace of Alcina is exploding with fireworks and rockets.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Versailles, Gardens, The Pleasures of the Enchanted Isle", 1664.
1664. Engraving and etching, black ink on rolled paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-86-57.
